ENTRY       R11773                      Reaction
NAME        propionyl-CoA:succinate CoA transferase
DEFINITION  Propanoyl-CoA + Succinate <=> Succinyl-CoA + Propanoate
EQUATION    C00100 + C00042 <=> C00091 + C00163
ENZYME      2.8.3.-
PATHWAY     rn00640  Propanoate metabolism
